title: Efficient CO2 fixation under atmospheric pressure using a metal- and halide-free heterogeneous catalyst
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,2981-2990
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00043A, Paper
Saikat Mandal, Khushboo S. Paliwal, Antarip Mitra, Venkataramanan Mahalingam
Pyrimidine based polymers are reported for CO2 adsorption studies. 1,3,5-triaminopyrimidine-based polymer using cheap linker terephthaldehyde is design and employed for the metal- and halide-free carbon dioxide cycloaddition reaction with epoxides.
